channel.title: Another Bingo request (with note page, please)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Another Bingo request (with note page, please)"

item.title: Re: Another Bingo request (with note page, please)
item.content:encoded: I was bingoed maybe half an hour before you replied, but thanks.

item.title: Re: Another Bingo request (with note page, please)
item.content:encoded: I have a suggestion for the site. It'd be helpful to new players if there was a section laying out in detail how to do a Sannin/S2+ Jonin run, because that seems to be the majority of the questions I field from my villagers. Better that they turn to the Wiki instead of pestering McMasters, eh?

item.title: Re: Another Bingo request (with note page, please)
item.content:encoded: Can you confirm that you are still unbingo'd? I'll bingo you the moment you confirm.

item.title: Re: Another Bingo request (with note page, please)
item.content:encoded: Please, I need to get Anonymous … still level 47, in Generic village…

item.title: Re: Another Bingo request (with note page, please)
item.content:encoded: I could really do with being bingoed…

item.title: Another Bingo request (with note page, please)
item.content:encoded: I just acquired Hyuk, and would like to get Anonymous (Right can wait, though). The character is Mayumi, level 47 and in Generic village.
